definitions.definition: The appearance of an organism based on a multifactorial combination of genetic traits and environmental factors, especially used in pedigrees .
Any observable characteristic of an organism, such as its morphological , developmental , biochemical or physiological properties, or its behavior .

main_definition: ( genetics , evolutionary theory ) The appearance of an organism based on a multifactorial combination of genetic traits and environmental factors, especially used in pedigrees .
secondary_definitions: ( genetics , evolutionary theory ) Any observable characteristic of an organism, such as its morphological , developmental , biochemical or physiological properties, or its behavior .
